text: welcome to twominenglish.com teaching
you English through two-minute lessons
in this lesson you will learn about the
idiom Dark Horse and how to use it in
your conversations
let's learn about the idiom Dark Horse a
dark horse is someone who has hidden
talents
correct Jeff a dark horse is a person of
little prominence or who has little
chance to be successful but who
surprises you at the End by succeeding
for example in the recent Marathon the
runner from Idaho turned out to be the
Dark Horse it was his first marathon
his abilities and potential were not
very well known but he managed to
succeed and beat other competitors who
were more popular here's another example
nobody thought Einstein would become a
scientist as he was poor in studies but
he proved to be a dark horse
in politics the idiom is used to speak
of a candidate who seems less popular or
has little chance of winning but comes
out Victorious or gains power
unexpectedly
yes a dark horse is like a mysterious
person whose abilities plans and
thoughts are not known
yes they are often difficult to judge
let's listen to some conversations with
examples of how to use this idiom
good idea
wow Irene I didn't know you can sing so
well
thank you Ben
you're actually advancing to the finals
in the competition
yes
yes aha so you're the dark horse in the
competition what's the band's name
ever heard of blue velvet
sure there's a time I used to listen to
good night friend all day long
really
well that was us
talk shows are saying the former high
court judge is the Dark Horse to be the
new governor
yeah he came from nowhere and he
achieved prominence in polls he's very
intelligent and a visionary
he may win some people have hidden
talents
we have a dark horse among us too
another politician
no I was talking Irene and I found out
she's one of the blue velvet members
really I love their songs
it's surprising that Isaac has won the
local Chess Championship
he's a dark horse who never knew he was
such a good player
yeah he hardly talks to anyone
I think he can even win the state finals
so you're the dark horse in the
